entity.name: Animated API
entity.description: The Animated library is designed to make animations fluid, powerful, and painless to build and maintain.
entity.descriptionClean: The Animated library is designed to make animations fluid, powerful, and painless to build and maintain.

entity.name: Expo GL
entity.description: GLView that acts as an OpenGL ES render target and provides GLContext. Useful for rendering 2D and 3D graphics.
entity.descriptionClean: GLView that acts as an OpenGL ES render target and provides GLContext. Useful for rendering 2D and 3D graphics.

entity.name: Lottie
entity.description: An ecosystem of libraries for parsing Adobe After Effects animations exported as JSON with bodymovin and rendering them natively!
entity.descriptionClean: An ecosystem of libraries for parsing Adobe After Effects animations exported as JSON with bodymovin and rendering them natively!

entity.name: Moti
entity.description: An universal animation package for React Native.
entity.descriptionClean: An universal animation package for React Native.

entity.name: React Native Animatable
entity.description: Standard set of easy to use animations and declarative transitions for React Native
entity.descriptionClean: Standard set of easy to use animations and declarative transitions for React Native

entity.name: React Native Reanimated
entity.description: React Native's Animated library reimplemented. With Reanimated, you can easily create smooth animations and interactions that run on the UI thread.
entity.descriptionClean: React Native's Animated library reimplemented. With Reanimated, you can easily create smooth animations and interactions that run on the UI thread.
entity.descriptionHtml: React Native's Animated library reimplemented. With Reanimated, you can easily create smooth animations and interactions that run on the UI thread.

entity.name: Rive
entity.description: Rive is a new way to build production-ready UI and graphics — with rich interactivity and state-driven animation. It removes the need for hard-coded graphics, empowering teams to iterate faster and build better products.
entity.descriptionClean: Rive is a new way to build production-ready UI and graphics — with rich interactivity and state-driven animation. It removes the need for hard-coded graphics, empowering teams to iterate faster and build better products.

entity.name: React Native Skia
entity.description: High-performance React Native Graphics using Skia (2D graphics engine).
entity.descriptionClean: High-performance React Native Graphics using Skia (2D graphics engine).

entity.name: three.js
entity.description: An easy-to-use, lightweight, cross-browser, general-purpose 3D library.
entity.descriptionClean: An easy-to-use, lightweight, cross-browser, general-purpose 3D library.
